synopsis.text:
New synopsis:

In the heart of New Saitama, Hayato Hayasugi, a young boy with a passion for trains and a name that hints at speed, stumbles upon a hidden world within his father's train museum. He discovers the E5 bullet train, but his curiosity is met with an urgent warning: a mysterious foe known as Bachigami, the bee god, threatens the city. In a twist of fate, Hayato's father's Shinca card transforms the bullet train into a formidable robot, the Shinkalion E5 Hayabusa.

Join Hayato and other children as they take on the role of conductors, piloting the Shinkalion robots, which are inspired by real-life Japanese bullet trains. Together with the Shinkansen Ultra Evolution Institute (SUEI), they must confront an enigmatic monster resembling a jet-black bullet train. Can they protect the peace of Japan and overcome the unknown evil that lies ahead? Embark on this thrilling journey to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
